text: Eric Johnson is a guitarist from the USA. He was born on August 17, 1954 in Austin, Texas. he is known for his song Cliffs of Dover which won the Grammy award in 1991. == Solo albums == * Seven Worlds (1978) (re-issue, 1998) * Tones (1986) * Ah Via Musicom (1990) * Venus Isle (1996) * Souvenir (2002) * Bloom (2005) * Live from Austin, TX (2005) ==Other websites== * *Eric Johnson Interview on FingerstyleGuitarists.com Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:American rock guitarists Category:Musicians from Austin, Texas
title: Eric Johnson
